text:
Small brown head. Clear red-brown color. 
Sweet and roasted malt tasste.
Thinn body. Fine but small bitterness.
330ml bottle, enjoyed straight out of the bottle. Roasted malt, chocolate, earthy notes. Quite nice, but a bit too fizzy.
Sample from bottle at Spritmuseum. Dark brown with small tan head. Aroma is bready and roasted. Taste has toffee, caramel-like notes and roasted malt with some hoppy notes. Finish is roasty
Flaska på Taylor & Jones Hornstull. Svart vätska med ljust skum. Söt lätt porter som smakar mer än lättöl
33 cl bottle. Pours dark brown with a deep amber glare and a small tan head. Aroma is roasted malty and breadish. Toffee, caramelish and roasted malt flavoured. Bitter and dry roasted finish.

Bottle at Papsøs tasting at Amager Bryghus.
Clear red-brown colored with a small off-white head.
Light roasted aroma of hay and chocolate.
Light roasted flavor of hay and chocolate.
Light roasted finish.
Bottle 33 cl. Pours black with a tint of orange and a beige head. Lovely roasty nose. Light body, pleasant dry roast, some dark, dried fruits, slightly ashy. Decent for what it is. 290115
Bottle. Dark brown colour with a beige head. Aroma is roasted malt, coffee, chocolate. Flavour is the same. Medium body. OK beer.
Bottle @ SBWF 2014. Pours a black color with a small tan head. Has a roasted malty caramel aroma. Roasted malty thin caramel flavor. Has a roasted malty thin caramel finish.
Sample at SMÖF 2014. Malty smell with chocolate and some dark malts. Dark malty smell with chocolate, some coffee and roasted notes. Very nice taste considering the low abv.

Bottled. Deep brown colour with a small beigeish brown head. Aroma is caramel, chocolate, some mild nutty and earthy notes as well. Flavour is coffee, mild ashes, some nutty and chocolaty notes along with some unpleasant earthiness to it. Still nice for a 2.25 % brew!
Bottle at SBWF2014. Dark brown color, small brownish head. Perfumic, caramel-chocolate aroma. Light-bodied. Light coffee, malts and vegetables. Watery.

Bottle 330ml. [ As Gamla Enskede Stora Gungans Porter ].[ Trade by Omhper ]. Clear dark brown color with a average to large, frothy, good lacing, mostly lasting, off-white to beige head. Aroma is moderate to heavy malty, roasted, burnt, dark roasted, light ash. Flavour is moderate sweet and moderate to heavy bitter with a long duration, roasted bitter, malt bitter, dark roasted, coffee, initial (cold) light metalic bitter. Body is medium, texture is watery, carbonation is soft. [20140706]

330ml Bottle - Daark brown, almost black, with a tan head. Peanut butter, roasted malt, cocoa and coffee in the aroma. Roasted taste with liquorice, coffee and some slightly burnt chocolate notes. Plenty of flavour for a lättöl and very enjoyable.
Bitter malziger, deutlich röstiger Antrunk. Süffig, leicht steigende Bitterkeit, rund. Nur leicht wässrig, insgesamt gut gelungen. 9/10/9/8/10/9

Bottle (33 cl) from ICA Åkared, Göteborg, Sweden. Clear deep reddish brown, small and brief beige head. Chocolatey roasted aroma with some coffee and tobacco, some floral hops. Light bodied, medium carbonation. Dry, medium bitterness.

Bottle, 2.25%. Very dark brown with medium beige head. Aroma roasted malts, chocolate, coffee and caramel. Flavour is roasted malts, light chocolate, light coffee, thin, little sweet, little thin and a medium bitter.

Bottle @ fonefan tasting. Almost black with a lasting beige head. Aroma is sweet, roasted malt and chocolate. Flavor is medium sweet and moderate bitter. Dry and moderate bitter finish. A bit thin. 060714
Dark brown of color with a brown head. A flavor of roasted malt, burnt wood, hops, and weak plastic. A flavor of roasted malt, bitter, malty, weak citrus and burnt.
Bottle @ fonefan tasting. Nice head with good duration. Color is dark brown. Aroma and taste are roast malt, chocolate, above average carbonation and hops. A bit thin and watery.

Bottle from Cajsa Warg. 

Black with a small head. Aroma of roasted malt, coffee, some smoke and ash. Similar taste. The body was light and the finish bitter and on the dry side. An ok one.

Bottle from ICA Åkerred cons 2014-05-22 Göteborg
AR: chocolate, coffey caramels
AP: dark brown body, frothy wee fizzy lively deminishing head
F: coffey, chocolate, charcole, liqurice, hollow feeling, big flavours but not nice to drink ... aroma and apperance are good!

Botle, thanks to larsniclas. Black beer wth a nice lasting offwhite/beige head. Roasted aroma, soot, dark chocolate, tar, some caramel. Tar flavor, licorice, really roasted, bitter coffee. really thin bodied, but with a decent amount of flavors

Bottled from Ica Åkerd
Dark brown with a small head. 
Lightly roasted aroma and flavour along with some milky chocolate. 
Light and dry bitterness.

Bottle from NK Saluhall.
Pours dark Brown with very Little head.
Light rosted malt, good balance.

(Bottle, from Hemköp Marieberg) Black colour with brief, foamy, beige head. Malty roasted nose with dark rye bread, coffee, caramel and a touch of liquorice. Roasted, malty taste with black coffee, dark chocolate, liquorice, black rye bread and a generous roasty bitterness in the finish. Thin body, dry. Tasty porter, with lots of flavour for such a low alcohol beer. Quite enjoyable.

Bottle, 33cl - Dark brown beer with a large beige head. Aroma is malty with notes of caramel, chocolate, soy sauce and milk. Flavor is roasty with notes of toffee, chocolate and coffee. Very enjoyable and refreshing.

Bottled, at Printz, Stockholm.  Near black, small head. Aroms of licorice and coffee. Mid dry with light body and cridp, rounded mouthfeel. Esrthy with coffee and mild bitterness. Impressive 2% porter.

How: Bottle.
Where: Product sample had at Akkurat, Stockholm.
Appearance: Black colour with an off-white head.
Aroma: Smoked malt, slight smokiness.
Body: Water body, low carbonation.
Flavour: Mild smoke, not much flavour.
Comment: Too watery. Could have needed some sweetness from the wort.

Doft: ölen doftar trevligt men känner att doften planar ut och blir vattnig snabbt. Den faller och håller inte ut hela vägen. Smak: smaken håller inte för att vara stout. Saknar kroppen och fylligheten. Ge upp du som kan brygger lätt öl till stout...en stout behöver sin kropp från sprit.
